items.name: Queso Nachos
items.description: Corn tortilla chips, house melted queso cheese, black beans and jalapeños with pico de gallo.

items.name: Grilled Corn Mexican Style
items.description: Two whole grilled corn served with mayo, cotija cheese, chili powder and lime.

items.name: Chicken Quesadilla
items.description: Melted Jack, chedder and cotija cheese and grilled chicken with your choice of cilantro-lime, white or chipotle sauce on side.

items.name: Vegetarian Quesadilla
items.description: Melted monterey jack cheese, black beans, roasted sweet n'spicy corn, tomatoes, cilantro, sour cream, lettuce, onions and guacamole.
